sentences.sContent: I inferred from what she said that you have not been well.
sentences.sCn: 我从她的话里推断出你身体一直不大好。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + fer(带来) → 带进(意义) → 推断

words.tran: 推理的；推论的；根据推理的

trans.tranCn: 推断， 推论， 推理
trans.tranOther: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have
